imdb.title: Megaro bokusu: Megalo Box
imdb.plot: Junk Dog, an underground fighter with the alias of "Gearless Joe" sets out to join the worlds most prestigious mecha boxing championship, Megalonia.

episodes.title: Apparitions hum the requiem
episodes.plot: Several years after the events of the first season, a despondent Joe now goes from boxing ring to boxing ring under the title "Nomad." But a chance encounter with a strange man has the potential to change the direction of his life.

episodes.title: Buy or Die?
episodes.plot: In the run-down slums of a futuristic city, the boxer only known as Junk Dog is making a living throwing fights for the mob in underground arenas. That all changes when he has a chance encounter with the champion, Yuri.

episodes.title: The Man Only Dies Once
episodes.plot: Yuri has sought Junk Dog out to test his mettle in the ring, and their encounter will leave the underground fighter a changed man.

episodes.title: Gear Is Dead
episodes.plot: Nanbu and Joe are preparing for their first official match, but in order to do that, they'll need to find a decent set of Gear first. While searching, they run into a group of orphan boys, thieving their way through life.

episodes.title: Let's Dance with Death
episodes.plot: Nanbu and Joe decide to make the ultimate gamble to get into Megalonia: Joe is going to be fighting without any kind Gear. Can a gearless boxer really survive in a sport designed to showcase the cybernetic enhancements?

episodes.title: The Man from Death
episodes.plot: Aragaki, a man from Coach Nanbu's past has accepted a fight with Joe. We learn his reason for accepting the fight, and his past.

episodes.title: Until The Last Dog Dies
episodes.plot: Joe's fight with Aragaki continues, as Joe sticks with Nanbu's training and his strong will to hold on.

episodes.title: The Road to Death
episodes.plot: There's one month until Megalonia begins, and it looks like Shirato Yukiko's brother, Mikio, is a lock for the final entrant into the tournament. Will Joe and Team Nowhere find a way to secure their spot in the Megalo Box championship tournament?

episodes.title: Deadline of the Dream
episodes.plot: Shirato Mikio has forced Team Nowhere to forfeit a match by threatening to expose Joe and Nanbu's seedy past. Will their dream of making it into the Megalonia tournament ever come true?

episodes.title: A Dead Flower Shall Never Bloom
episodes.plot: It's man vs machine, as "Gearless" Joe squares off against Shirato Mikio, who is guided by Ace, an artificial intelligence of his own design.

episodes.title: The Die Is Cast
episodes.plot: Crime boss Fujimaki has decided that Team Nowhere needs to throw their opening match in Megalonia in order to repay their debt to him. Can the team survive this blow to their ambitions? And even if they do, and Joe wins, will they survive the gangster's wrath?

episodes.title: A Deadmarch
episodes.plot: Joe faces off against the bloody lion, Glen Burroughs. If he wants his friends to live, he'll have to throw the match. After coming this far - is there nothing else Team Nowhere can do?

episodes.title: Leap Over the Edge of Death
episodes.plot: Inspired by Joe's meteoric rise, and wanting to face him in a fair fight, Yuri makes a decision that will change everything for himself and Yukiko.

episodes.title: Born To Die
episodes.plot: The Megalonia championship match begins between Joe and Yuri. The match ends up going on for thirteen rounds. A year after the final Nanbu opens a gym.
